components.name: Single Mass Flywheel
components.function: Provides inertia to engage the clutch when pressed

components.name: Multi-plate Clutch
components.function: Transmits torque from engine to transmission during engagement and disengagement

components.name: Clutch Pedal Assembly
components.function: Controls the engagement and disengagement of the clutch

components.name: Release Bearing
components.function: Allows smooth movement of the clutch pedal while releasing the clutch
